name: TVMonogramContentConfiguration
desc: A content configuration for a monogram view.

items.name: static func cell() -> TVMonogramContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration for a circular monogram cell.

items.name: var personNameComponents: PersonNameComponents?
items.desc: The name the system uses when creating a monogram image.

items.name: var textProperties: TVMonogramContentConfiguration.TextProperties
items.desc: Properties for configuring the primary text.

items.name: var secondaryTextProperties: TVMonogramContentConfiguration.TextProperties
items.desc: Properties for configuring the secondary text.

items.name: struct TVMonogramContentConfiguration.TextProperties
items.desc: Properties that affect the monogram content configuration’s text.

items.name: func makeContentView() -> UIView & UIContentView
items.desc: Creates a new instance of the content view using this configuration.

items.name: func updated(for: UIConfigurationState) -> TVMonogramContentConfiguration
items.desc: Generates a configuration for the specified state by applying the configuration’s default values for that state to any properties that you haven’t customized.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: static func == (TVMonogramContentConfiguration, TVMonogramContentConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.

items.name: static func != (TVMonogramContentConfiguration, TVMonogramContentConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the value by passing them into the hasher.
